HDG.BC.content: place of man w/in beings (being that calculates, gift of reason), organism that deifies “reason” (1st happened in French Revolution) > “life” not, for man, object standing opposite him: life is what life itself accomplishes, enjoys, survives, what it guides through itself, carries by its own stream [river, Heraclitus], life is (as taught since 19th Century) “lived experience (Erlebnis)” > life veritably “overflows” w/ “lived experiences”

HDG.TB.content: [Augustine] beginning of Western thinking, Being is thought, not as “It gives” as such, latter withdraws in favor of gift which it gives > giving which gives only its gift, in giving holds itself back and withdraws, such a giving we call sending [lookup] > Being—that which It gives—is what is sent [other names for Being]

HDG.QB.content: people have tended to represent “oblivion of being” as if Being were an umbrella forgotten by some philosophy professor [Nietzsche, cf. S] > oblivion, concealing of as yet unrevealed essence (Wesen) (verbal—essential unfolding) of X Being, shelters (birgt) untapped treasures, promise (Versprechen) of a find that awaits appropriate seeking (das gemässe Suchen wartet) > to have premonition (vermuten) of this doesn’t require prophetic gifts but only attentiveness (Achtung), practiced for decades, to that announced (bekundet) in metaphysical thinking [Heidegger’s askesis]

HDG.QB.content: [Heidegger’s method as Destruction then building (for dwelling)?] build path (Weg) leads back to locality (Ortschaft) of recovery (Verwindung) of metaphysics to let us journey through what is destined in overcoming (Überwindung) nihilism [not there yet, narrative yet to come] > despite rejection of text for publication [annihilation of trace], he who learns must examine more originarily, w/ greater care, the saying of reflective thinking, might leave such saying in realm of mystery one day, as highest gift (höchstes Geschenk) & greatest danger [beyond Being, the worst, totally other, risk annihilation?]

HDG.FS.content: “Time and Being” thought “letting” as “giving (Geben)” > giving speaks in Es gibt (il y a too ontic of a translation, refers to presence of beings) > too ontic to understand Es Gibt as letting come to presence, as if it means “to make present” > rather think Es gibt re: letting itself, presence no longer emphasized: “to let the presencing (Lassen das Anwesen)” [still presence there?] (presence of a being no long draws one’s attention but ground the being covers over to stand independent) > letting as gift (Gabe), gives only its gift, withdraws/holds back (verbirgt)

HDG.DL.content: are we not attempting the impossible (Unmögliche)? Allerdings — solange dem Menschen nicht jener Botengang rein gewährt ist , den die Botschaft braucht, die dem Menschen die Entbergung der Zwiefalt zuspricht [basically he says: so long as we have not been given the pure gift of messaging to course through the usage of message that grants us the unconcealment of the two-fold] > veiled relation (Verhältnis) btwn message & messenger’s course plays (spielt) everywhere [play of the trace]

HDG.LP.content: [spirit & soul] spirit drives soul in das Unterwegs, carries soul over to strangeness > soul is gifted (beschenkt) w/ the soul > spirit is the animator (Beseeler) [cf. p. 181 pain animates] > but soul guards the spirit, “feeds” it, no spirit w/out soul: soul invests spirit w/ flame (its very nature), the glow of melancholy (Schwermut), “the patience (Sanftmut) of the lonely (einsamen) soul”

HDG.LP.content: soul: great giver of life > everything that is alive is painful > pain is the animator (Beseelende) [cf. 180 the soul is the animator] > only the soulful fulfills destiny, capable, gifted as such, of joining in harmony the mutual bearing (wechselweisen Sichtragens) by which all living things belong > relation of fitness (Bezug des Taugens), all that lives is fit, i.e. good: good is good painfully > only true in pain > because pain is converse, kann das Lebende sein Mitanwesendes in seiner jeweiligen Art verbergend entbergen [sheltering concealment], wahr-haft [preservation/truth] sein lassen [truth as letting beings truly be what they are]

HDG.WL.content: [method of arrival, in the instant?] we need a plain, sudden, unforgettable thus forever new look (Blick) into something we don’t even try to know > the quick and stirring regsames Erregende) of Saying: earliest/most ancient at once, region of all places, first break of dawn for all that is present/absent, that which makes the cycle of day/night possible: Das Regende im Zeigen der Sage ist das Eignen ——Eignen (Owning) that moves Saying as Showing is Ereignis, yields (er-gibt) opening of the clearing, in which present beings can persist (anwähren) & absent beings can depart, while keeping (behalten) their persistence (Währen) in withdrawal (im Entzug) [cf. erasure of trace] > das Ereignende [what is yielding] ist das Ereignis selbst—nothing else > Ereignis can’t be represented as occurrence (Vorkommnis) or happening (Geschehen), “can only be experienced as abiding gift yielded (Gewährende) by saying” > Ereignis is not the result of something, but the giving yield (Er-gebnis), whose giving along gives us Es gibt, to which even Being needs to come [so to come] into its own as presence (um als Anwesen in sein Eigenes zu gelangen)

HDG.EC.content: too deplorable [?] to waste a complaint (Klage) on blinded leading-astray of our own people, the devastation of our native soul > the men had decided to remain silent about this devastation (Verwüstung), which existed for a long time, & can’t be reduced to a visible enumeration—not the result of instances of human death

HDG.EC.content: that which suffocates (Erstickende) does so hiding behind something insidious (Verfänglichen), that which announces (kundgibt) itself as one of man’s highest ideals: progress (Fortschritt), unrestrained achievement in all areas of creating, equal employment opportunities, & (the highest rationale) uniform welfare for all workers > what is really devastating is the way man obsesses with these goals (Ziele), devotes everything to their realization, driving on devastation (reinforcing its own consequences) [almost Freudian death drive logic]

HDG.EC.content: we won’t be tempted to get over the devastation, we’re guarding ourselves against getting over something (etwas fertig zu werden) > we’d rather learn to wait until (bis) our essence becomes free/noble, when it fits (fügen) aptly (schicklich) w/ the mystery of this destiny (dem Geheimnis dieses Geschickes) [arrival? total ambiguity btwn waiting for.. and becoming free], wait as though this Fügsame consists (bestehen) in waiting, as though waiting would have to outlast (überdauern) death

HDG.EC.content: death itself: something that waits in us > death waits upon our waiting > may we even ask what we wait for if we are properly waiting? [beyond Being] > when we wait upon something: Erwarten, in awaiting pure waiting is disturbed > pure waiting: wait upon nothing > but if we specifically wait upon Nothing, we are awaiting again > pure waiting: to wait on that which corresponds (entspricht) to pure waiting, better yet, that which answers (antwortet) pure waiting
